News.headline: Post Match Reaction: John Still on the Torquay United game
News.page_title: Post Match Reaction: John Still on the Torquay United game
News.URL_keywords: Post Match Reaction: John Still on the Torquay United game
News.short_description: John Still was dissapointed with the result away at Torquay.
News.description:
"We went down to ten men, but I think that for a lot of the game we had the ascendancy and carried the game, we just lacked the final pass or cross."
  
"I thought that we lacked a little bit of knowledge on what we needed to do, we tried to give information into the players from the side but Scott Doe coming off was a big miss."
 
"It was at times like this when players like Boucaud and Guttridge are going to be coming into play, and today we didn’t have those two."

"We missed Benson as well as we would have probably brought him on tonight as we needed a little bit of knowledge, which we understand that we don’t have in abundance."

"I don’t think we could have given more as I was pleased with our effort, determination and our quality up until the final third."
 
"Josh Staunton has come in and played quite a few games and Robson had done nothing wrong when he had played and he has had a good season so far. We wanted to give Staunton a rest but he ended up coming on in the game."
